type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.tasks.InstallExecutable
type.description: Installs an executable with it's dependent libraries so it can be easily executed.

method.name: getDestinationDir
method.description: The directory to install files into.

method.name: getLibs
method.description: The library files that should be installed.

method.name: getPlatform
method.description: The platform describing the install target.

method.name: getRunScript
method.description: Returns the script file that can be used to run the install image.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: The tool chain used for linking.

method.name: lib
method.description: Adds a set of library files to be installed. The provided libs object is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

property.name: destinationDir
property.description: The directory to install files into.

property.name: libs
property.description: The library files that should be installed.

property.name: platform
property.description: The platform describing the install target.

property.name: runScript
property.description: Returns the script file that can be used to run the install image.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: The tool chain used for linking.
